thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Suz001
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Suz001

author: Suz001
title: Suz001
text:
Good news: I have bought and enjoyed White Mountain Puzzles for many years. Outstanding designs and the large variety of subjects means that I never have trouble picking new puzzles to order. In the past I have always been confident of receiving quality products.
Bad news: I just finished working the Neon Signs (#1061) puzzle and was very disappointed with the board quality. The pieces are too thin to truly interlock and each time I happened to bump the puzzle, no matter how slight,the jarring, large sections would disintegrate and have to be reassembled.
Now, I will watch for the words "New, thicker pieces" to appear in White Mountain Ads. Until then, I have bought my last WM puzzle.
